private void wletterTFActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
// TODO add your handling code here:
}

private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {
// TODO add your handling code here:
String mathScore, scienceScore, philoScore, englishScore, writingScore;
double average = 0;
double Equivalent = 0;

mathScore = mathTF.getText();
scienceScore = scienceTF.getText();
philoScore = philoTF.getText();
englishScore = englishTF.getText();
writingScore = writingTF.getText();

double math = Double.parseDouble(mathScore);
double science = Double.parseDouble(scienceScore);
double philo = Double.parseDouble(philoScore);
double english = Double.parseDouble(englishScore);
double writing= Double.parseDouble(writingScore);

average = ((math + science + philo + english + writing) /5);

if (math &lt;=1.00){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;98-100&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=1.25){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;95-97&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=1.50){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;92-94&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=1.75){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;89-91&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=2.00){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;85-88&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=2.25){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;82-84&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=2.50){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;79-81&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=2.75){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;77-78&quot;);
}
else if(math &lt;=3.00){
mletterTF.setText(&quot;75-76&quot;);
}
if (science &lt;=1.00){

sletterTF.setText(&quot;98-100&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=1.25){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;95-97&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=1.50){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;92-94&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=1.75){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;89-91&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=2.00){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;85-88&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=2.25){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;82-84&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=2.50){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;79-81&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=2.75){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;77-78&quot;);
}
else if(science &lt;=3.00){
sletterTF.setText(&quot;75-76&quot;);
}if (philo &lt;=1.00){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;98-100&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=1.25){

pletterTF.setText(&quot;95-97&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=1.50){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;92-94&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=1.75){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;89-91&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=2.00){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;85-88&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=2.25){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;82-84&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=2.50){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;79-81&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=2.75){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;77-78&quot;);
}
else if(philo &lt;=3.00){
pletterTF.setText(&quot;75-76&quot;);
}if (english &lt;=1.00){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;98-100&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=1.25){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;95-97&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=1.50){

eletterTF.setText(&quot;92-94&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=1.75){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;89-91&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=2.00){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;85-88&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=2.25){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;82-84&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=2.50){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;79-81&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=2.75){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;77-78&quot;);
}
else if(english &lt;=3.00){
eletterTF.setText(&quot;75-76&quot;);
}if (writing &lt;=1.00){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;98-100&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=1.25){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;95-97&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=1.50){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;92-94&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=1.75){

wletterTF.setText(&quot;89-91&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=2.00){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;85-88&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=2.25){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;82-84&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=2.50){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;79-81&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=2.75){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;77-78&quot;);
}
else if(writing &lt;=3.00){
wletterTF.setText(&quot;75-76&quot;);
}
else{

}
averageTF.setText(Double.toString(average));
}
